price: 90. Ilaa markuu gaaray meeshay ka soo baxdo qorraxda wuxuu helay iyadoo ay u soo baxaysa qolo aynu siin wax ay isaga asturaan21.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطۡلِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطۡلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ لَّمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتۡرٗا
footnotes: 21. Dad masaakiin ah aan waxba heysan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā balagha maṭliʿa al-shamsi wajadahā taṭluʿu ʿalā qawmin lam najʿal lahum min dūnihā sit'ran
